directions: In a medium sized heavy pot, add coconut milk, rice, water, ginger, garlic, salt and coconut; bring to a bowl over medium heat.
Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer until all liquid evaporates, about 40-45 minutes. Remove from heat, keep covered for 10 more minutes. Fluff with a fork; toss with cilantro.
ingredients: 1 cup uncooked brown rice (brown jasmine, basmati or short grain works well)
1/4 tsp salt, or more to taste
title: Brown Coconut Rice with Cilantro
